Serialized Form

  • Package Client

    • Class Client.Deck

      class Deck extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • boardCards
          List<T> boardCards
          List of Boardcards, containing the top card of the deck, the first board card and the second board card
        • deckSize
          int deckSize
          The remaining cards in the deck, excluding the board cards but not the top card

    • Class Client.Player

      class Player extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • achievementPoints
          int achievementPoints
          The number of points the player has earned by completing achievements
        • active
          boolean active
          The status of the player. If true, it is the player's turn
        • color
          Color color
          The color of the player
        • handSize
          int handSize
          The size of the hand of the player
        • manuscript
          Manuscript manuscript
          The manuscript of the player
        • manuscriptPoints
          int manuscriptPoints
          The number of points the player has earned by placing cards
        • name
          String name
          The name of the player
        • ready
          boolean ready
          The status of the player. If true, the player is ready to start the game

  • Package Server.Card

    • Class Server.Card.AchievementCard

      class AchievementCard extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • backFace
          EmptyCardFace backFace
          The back face of the card. It's empty
        • frontFace
          AchievementFrontFace frontFace
          The front face of the card. It contains the score and the requirements to obtain it

  • Package Server.Manuscript

    • Class Server.Manuscript.Graph

      class Graph extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • cardNeighbors
          List<Map<CardCorners,CornerCardFace>> cardNeighbors
          A list of maps that represent the neighbors of each card. For each card, the map contains the corner and the card that is connected to that corner
        • containedCards
          List<CornerCardFace> containedCards
          A list of all the cards in the graph
        • root
          CornerCardFace root
          The root of the graph

    • Class Server.Manuscript.Manuscript

      class Manuscript extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • activeSymbols
          Map<Symbol,Integer> activeSymbols
          A map containing for each symbol its corresponding number in the manuscript
        • graph
          Graph graph
          The graph of cards in the manuscript

    • Class Server.Messages.ReconnectionMessage

      class ReconnectionMessage extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • chat
          Chat chat
          The chat messages
        • commonAchievements
          List<AchievementCard> commonAchievements
          The common achievements
        • gameState
          GameState gameState
          The current game state
        • goldDeck
          Deck<GoldCard> goldDeck
          The gold deck
        • hand
          List<Card> hand
          The hand of the player
        • id
          String id
          If the message is sent to the server, the id is the current id of the client, if the message is sent to the client, the id is the new id to set
        • name
          String name
          The name of the player the client joined as
        • newId
          String newId
          The id of the player the client wants to reconnect with
        • players
          List<Player> players
          The list of players in the game
        • resourceDeck
          Deck<ResourceCard> resourceDeck
          The resource deck
        • secretAchievement
          AchievementCard secretAchievement
          The secret achievement of the player
        • turn
          int turn
          The current game turn

      class StartGameMessage extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • goldBoardCards
          List<GoldCard> goldBoardCards

        • resourceBoardCards

          The resource board cards. The first card is the top card of the deck, the other cards are the board cards
